name: Time to Rest
description:
Game realised for the GameDev.tv Community Jam (2020), theme: 'Time'.

You trespassed into an old cemetery, looking for valuable artifacts belonged to the ancient warriors buried here.

Pick up the axe on the alter in  front of you, and prepare for the fight!

Fight endless zombie warriors in this third person action game, where TIMING your attacks correctly is key to put these zombies back to rest!
